message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I take a bit more to account for inflation.
Alice, my turn. Let's be reasonable. This offer leaves me a bit more, considering the inflation works against me.
Bob, I need you to meet me halfway here. This is a fair offer considering the time pressure and inflation.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. This is a fair 50/50 split. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
